QuestData.Title: The Pale Threat
QuestData.Description: If we are to succeed in stopping Cho'gall from destroying the naaru, we will need to fight our way through the Underpale; a dark, winding cavern infested with the Pale.$b$bThe Pale are fallen orcs that despise all that is good and holy. The longer they are left to their devices beneath the ground, the further their dark plots progress.$b$bMake your way into the Underpale, slay the vile creatures within and take out their leader, Greyseer.
QuestData.RewardText: The Pale are wretched creatures that hate the Light and plot against the innocent. Without Greyseer to lead them, they will be disorganized and in chaos for a time.$b$bShould a new leader arise from within their ranks, we shall smite them down once more.
